"Xitrae": "Test, test... Can you hear me? You're <%me>, right?"
"Sorry to contact you out of nowhere like this. I'm Xitrae, from the ARKS Supply Corps."
"I've heard stories about how reliable of a person you are. So I've got a job for you!"
"I wanna give you the details, so could you come and see me?"
"<%me>, long time no see! You remember me... right?"
"It's Xitrae from the ARKS Supply Corps."
"Listen, there's been a bit of trouble regarding supplies... So I want to get your advice."
"I wanna give you the details, so could you come and see me?"
